title: Topic 004 Question 015
body: You have the following data sources:
•	Finance: On-premises Microsoft SQL Server database
•	Sales: Azure Cosmos DB using the Core (SQL) API
You need to ensure that you can search all the data by using the Azure Cognitive Search REST API.
options: Export the data in Finance to Azure Data Lake Storage.
Configure multiple read replicas for the data in Sales.
Ingest the data in Logs into Azure Data Explorer.
Migrate the data in HR to Azure Blob storage.
